title: Natchathira Bangala Lyrics Nesam
stanzas:
vidha vidhamaa sela katti
mola molamaa malli vachi
jockettula jannal vachi
face cutula minnal vachi
oduthaar paar kudhira
idhu pora idam madhura
un nenjukulla dhill irundhaa
ninnu paaru edhura (2)

engaloda veettukilla kadhavu
vaasal kadhavu
ada ellaarum ellaarum
inga varavu, kudumbam varavu

chilli chicken polathaandi
udambu, kannadi udambu
ivan pidikkura pidiyila
norungum ezhumbu.
mudhugu ezhumbu.

ah saingaalam sallaaba sangeetham
naanthaane unnoda sandhosam

license-u thevayilla enakku
ippa naan unakku.
nee eduthida eduthida
kodukkum sarakku
enakkul irukku.

paappaa, udhatula oru
muththam vachi thodangu
kanakka thodangu.
ivan madiyila vidiyira
varaikkum mayangu.
sugamaa urangu.

haiyyo haiyyo rummum
jinnum onnaa ooththu
enna aagum paarkalaam.
yezhaam number roomkulla
kannaa moochi aadalaam.

ippodhe ennodu vandhaadu va
en nenjodu roja poo
pandhaadu.

vidha vidhamaa sela katti
mola molamaa malli vachi
jockettula jannal vachi
face cutula minnal vachi
oduthaar paar kudhira
idhu pora idam madhura
un nenjukulla dhill irundhaa
ninnu paaru edhura
